Class CourseController

java.lang.Object
com.github.ilim.backend.controller.CourseController
@RestController public class CourseController extends Object
REST controller for managing courses.

Provides endpoints for filtering published courses, retrieving course details, managing course purchases, creating and updating courses, and handling course module operations.

See Also:
  • CourseService
  • CoursePurchaseService
  • UserService

  • Constructor Details

      public CourseController()

  • Method Details

    • filterPublishedCourses

      @GetMapping("/course/published") public ApiRes<Res<List<PublicCourseDto>>> filterPublishedCourses(@RequestParam(value="contains",required=false) String contains)
      Retrieves a list of published courses, optionally filtering by a search keyword.

      Invokes the CourseService.filterPublishedCourses(String) method to obtain the list of PublicCourseDto based on the provided search criteria.

      Note: Pagination should be implemented for this endpoint to handle large datasets.

      Parameters:
      contains - an optional search keyword to filter courses by title or description
      Returns:
      an ApiRes containing a list of PublicCourseDto representing published courses

    • findCourseById

      @GetMapping("/course/{courseId}") public ApiRes<Res<Course>> findCourseById(@AuthenticationPrincipal org.springframework.security.oauth2.jwt.Jwt jwt, @PathVariable UUID courseId)
      Retrieves detailed information about a specific course.

      Extracts the user's information from the JWT (if available), invokes the CourseService.findCourseByIdAndUser(User, UUID) method, and returns the detailed Course entity.

      Parameters:
      jwt - the JWT token containing the user's authentication details (optional)
      courseId - the ID of the course to retrieve
      Returns:
      an ApiRes containing the Course entity

    • findPurchasedCourses

      @GetMapping("/student/course/purchased") @PreAuthorize("hasAnyRole('Student', 'INSTRUCTOR')") public ApiRes<Res<List<Course>>> findPurchasedCourses(@AuthenticationPrincipal org.springframework.security.oauth2.jwt.Jwt jwt)
      Retrieves a list of courses purchased by the authenticated user.

      Extracts the user's information from the JWT, invokes the CourseService.findPurchasedCourses(User) method, and returns a list of purchased Course entities.

      Parameters:
      jwt - the JWT token containing the user's authentication details
      Returns:
      an ApiRes containing a list of Course entities purchased by the user

    • findCreatedCourses

      @GetMapping("/instructor/course/created") @PreAuthorize("hasRole('INSTRUCTOR')") public ApiRes<Res<List<Course>>> findCreatedCourses(@AuthenticationPrincipal org.springframework.security.oauth2.jwt.Jwt jwt)
      Retrieves a list of courses created by the authenticated instructor.

      Extracts the instructor's information from the JWT, invokes the CourseService.findCreatedCourses(User) method, and returns a list of created Course entities.

      Parameters:
      jwt - the JWT token containing the instructor's authentication details
      Returns:
      an ApiRes containing a list of Course entities created by the instructor

    • updateCourse

      @PutMapping("/instructor/update-course/{courseId}") @PreAuthorize("hasAnyRole('INSTRUCTOR', 'ADMIN')") public ApiRes<Res<String>> updateCourse(@AuthenticationPrincipal org.springframework.security.oauth2.jwt.Jwt jwt, @PathVariable UUID courseId, @Valid @RequestBody @Valid CourseDto dto)
      Updates an existing course as an instructor or admin.

      Extracts the user's information from the JWT, invokes the CourseService.updateCourse(User, UUID, CourseDto) method, and returns a response indicating successful course update.

      Parameters:
      jwt - the JWT token containing the user's authentication details
      courseId - the ID of the course to be updated
      dto - the course update request payload containing updated course details
      Returns:
      an ApiRes containing a success message

    • purchaseCourse

      @PostMapping("/student/purchase-course/{courseId}") @PreAuthorize("hasAnyRole('STUDENT', 'INSTRUCTOR')") public ApiRes<Res<String>> purchaseCourse(@AuthenticationPrincipal org.springframework.security.oauth2.jwt.Jwt jwt, @PathVariable UUID courseId)
      Initiates the purchase process for a course.

      Extracts the user's information from the JWT, invokes the CoursePurchaseService.purchaseCourse(User, UUID) method, and returns the checkout URL for payment.

      Parameters:
      jwt - the JWT token containing the user's authentication details
      courseId - the ID of the course to be purchased
      Returns:
      an ApiRes containing the checkout URL as a string

    • reorderCourseModules

      @PutMapping("/instructor/course/{courseId}/reorder-modules") @PreAuthorize("hasRole('INSTRUCTOR')") public ApiRes<Res<String>> reorderCourseModules(@AuthenticationPrincipal org.springframework.security.oauth2.jwt.Jwt jwt, @PathVariable UUID courseId, @RequestBody List<UUID> modulesOrder)
      Reorders the modules within a course.

      Extracts the user's information from the JWT, invokes the CourseService.reorderCourseModules(User, UUID, List) method, and returns a response indicating successful reordering.

      Parameters:
      jwt - the JWT token containing the user's authentication details
      courseId - the ID of the course whose modules are to be reordered
      modulesOrder - the list of module IDs in the desired order
      Returns:
      an ApiRes containing a success message

    • checkCoursePurchase

      @PostMapping("/student/course/{courseId}/check-purchase") @PreAuthorize("hasAnyRole('STUDENT', 'INSTRUCTOR')") public ApiRes<Res<PurchaseStatus>> checkCoursePurchase(@AuthenticationPrincipal org.springframework.security.oauth2.jwt.Jwt jwt, @PathVariable UUID courseId)
      Checks the purchase status of a course for the authenticated user.

      Extracts the user's information from the JWT, invokes the CoursePurchaseService.checkCoursePurchase(User, UUID) method, and returns the purchase status.

      Parameters:
      jwt - the JWT token containing the user's authentication details
      courseId - the ID of the course to check purchase status for
      Returns:
      an ApiRes containing the PurchaseStatus of the course

    • cancelCoursePurchase

      @PostMapping("/student/course/{courseId}/cancel-purchase") @PreAuthorize("hasAnyRole('STUDENT', 'INSTRUCTOR')") public ApiRes<Res<String>> cancelCoursePurchase(@AuthenticationPrincipal org.springframework.security.oauth2.jwt.Jwt jwt, @PathVariable UUID courseId)
      Cancels the purchase of a course for the authenticated user.

      Extracts the user's information from the JWT, invokes the CoursePurchaseService.cancelCoursePurchase(User, UUID) method, and returns a response indicating successful cancellation.

      Parameters:
      jwt - the JWT token containing the user's authentication details
      courseId - the ID of the course whose purchase is to be canceled
      Returns:
      an ApiRes containing a success message

    • simulateCoursePurchaseConfirmation

      @PostMapping("/admin/confirm-course-purchase") @PreAuthorize("hasAnyRole('ADMIN')") public ApiRes<Res<String>> simulateCoursePurchaseConfirmation(@Valid @RequestBody @Valid PaymentEventDto dto)
      Simulates the confirmation of a course purchase.

      Accepts a PaymentEventDto containing payment event details, invokes the CoursePurchaseService.simulateCoursePurchaseConfirmation(PaymentEventDto) method, and returns a response indicating successful simulation.

      Parameters:
      dto - the payment event data transfer object containing confirmation details
      Returns:
      an ApiRes containing a success message
